features: INCLUDES: Contains 2 Packs of 2 Steripod Clip on Toothbrush Protectors, fits most manual and power toothbrushes

BRISTLE PROTECTION: These toothbrush protector's patented design uses fresh scented thymol vapors, a safe and ingredient found in most mouthwashes, used to help keep toothbrushes smelling clean and fresh for up to 3 months

MULTI PURPOSE: This toothbrush protector slips onto the brush head to provide ample coverage for its bristles, while offering protection from cross contamination between brushes, its simple clip on design makes it perfect for travel
A NEW WORLD OF CLEAN: These toothbrush protective covers are made of durable, food safe plastic and are made without BPA
STAY CONNECTED: Use hashtag steripod to share images of Steripod Toothbrush Protectors in the wild, or text the number on the back of the package to get a 3 month replacement reminder
body.description: Toothbrushes serve one purpose--to keep beautiful smiles fresh and clean. One of the most convenient and easiest ways to do this is with the Steripod Clip-on Toothbrush Protector. This protector cover fits most manual and electric toothbrushes and helps prevent cross-contamination between brushes, which is especially important during cold and flu season and while traveling. This one-of-a-kind protector is easy to clip-on, and is infused with active vapors (Thymol), a safe ingredient found in many mouthwashes. The protective Steripod's patented design helps keep brushes smelling fresh and clean for up to 3 months, the same amount of time dentists' recommend for toothbrush replacement. Get America's #1 toothbrush protector and give your family protection & peace of mind!

Protect Those Bristles: The protective design of this toothbrush protector uses fresh-scented thymol vapors, a safe ingredient used to help keep toothbrushes smelling fresh and clean for up to 3 months Stay Connected: Use hashtag #Steripod to share images of Steripod Toothbrush Protectors in the wild, or text the number on the back of the package to get a 3-month replacement reminder Ideal for Home or Travel: The Steripod Clip-on Toothbrush Protector easily clips on to your toothbrush head to keep it clean and safe wherever you go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for frequent travelers
reviews.reviewText: I use them all the time, great for keeping your toothbrush clean when traveling and any other time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps toothbrushes sanitized
reviews.reviewText: I love using these for traveling as it keeps my toothbrush clean from germs and it gets rid of the need for using a secondary carrier for it. It's also really nice too since if you're packing your bag with it it won't leave any residue in your suitcase or bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product and a better value than buying in my local retailer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These keep your toothbrush minty and clean! Love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product but smells funky
reviews.reviewText: I really love this clip for the toothbrush but.... it comes with a really bad weird smell hence the 4 stars. I don’t know how to remove that odor. It seems to be coming from the inside. The smell can be strong when removing from packaging and it sticks to your hands -___-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gives me a sense of protection
reviews.reviewText: These keep your toothbrush fresh and protected from airborne viruses or cleaning sprays

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchase when you see it
reviews.reviewText: I do not know about other areas in the US but these Steripods are hard to find at my local Walgreens, Tartget, Walmart or other stores. The shelf space for them is often empty. I like the simplistic design and application. Great for travel or home.
